wid.title: What I do
wid.introduction: I have completed a 3-month internship at FPT, where I specialized in backend development using Java Spring and Thymeleaf. This experience not only solidified my technical skills but also deepened my understanding of team workflows in international enterprises. I learned to work efficiently, manage my time effectively, and collaborate with colleagues to achieve common goals.

footer.class: Class of 2020-2025, Industrial University of Ho Chi Minh City

user.name: Nguyễn Xuân An
user.description: I am a software engineer with expertise in backend development using Java, and I have experience working with frontend technologies like React JS and React Native. I am currently finishing my studies in software engineering and about to graduate. Want to know how I can contribute to your project? Check out my project portfolio and online resume.
